reviews.review: The most creative game ever!
개짱
Semplicemente geniale! Un grandissimo gioco, da giocare in singolo e rigiocare in coop! Partendo dall'ottima base del primo sono riusciti a fare un altrettanto bel secondo capitolo!
脑洞大开！玩多少次都不会腻味的！
Good game.
Игра стоит свои мани
Nice Game
Jogo bonito, formoso e bem feito.
Очень слоооооооооооооожна
Игра столетия!!! Игра Всех времен!!! Хорошее продолжение хорошой игры. Плюс мультиплеер

pretty dank af.

Even after five years, this game still has one of the best flowing combination of story and gameplay I have been able to experience. This is a great game, and i would reccomend it to anyone and everyone! The only thing this game leaves me craving is more, and I wish valve would continue the portal series, but sadly, I do not believe that will ever happen.

una jugabilidad sencilla y entendible para cualquiera, haciendote volar horas y horas resolviendo puzzle's
juego muy recomendado
ez reseña

能把这个游戏做出来的人脑洞不是一般的大

Love Portal 2 - Great re-play value
「傳送門2」是一個充滿未來感的益智遊戲，關卡只有你想不到的，沒有你做不到的，挑戰物理邏輯的極限，除此之外，遊戲的故事也很引人入勝，讓我玩遊戲常常分心聽它們說故事XD
Amazing story and infinite replayability with workshop

Portal 2 пожалуй навсегда останется одной из самых любимых игр, которую не надоест перепроходить. :) 
10/10

Рекомендую эту игру тем, кто любит головоломки, портальные пушки и тортики :3

Aboslutly amazing. My #1 game of all time. I've played it enough times that i know how to complete all puzzles immedietly after entering and still i will come back again and again. The game shows how a story can change an entire game while also showing how much you can do with so little characters. 100% recommend this to anyone who enjoys puzzle games and some nice dark humour to go along with it.
this is a fun game

Classic 
Still perfect for a puzzle game lover
If you some brain teasing stuff portal is great for you
The workshop in this game just keeps giving even after the 10/10 story content.
The part where he kills you
Лучшая игра для того чтобы развивать мозговые способности,берите,не пожалейте,проходил ее дважды, плюс есть годный кооператив!!
awesome game full of fun innovative levels....single player harder than co-op...gr8 humour as well

Проверено временем - эту игру я многократно проходил на разных платформах с большим удовольствием.
Надеюсь, что 3-ей части быть, и не придется ждать целую вечность как с HL3. Хотя кого я обманываю?
Пора уже начать принимать ставки на то, что же случится раньше: сдача Зенит-Арены или релиз Half-Life 3.
Ein absolutes "must have" für jeden Gamer
esta muy shido la historia esta muy entretenida y tiene buen coop

The villain of this game needs a hug. That's why there's a companion cube... for hugs.

10/10 would hug again.
Good game, play the fist one first!
该写的还是要写，我刚提名portal2为我的时间考验奖，portal2的舞台设计还有台词功底真的是看一次就会心一笑从一开始不明所以到后来的安安觉得glados的腹黑萌，真心有的时候就觉得这个游戏可以时常翻出来回味回味，当然portal也秉承的V社传统——3代遥遥无期。
Now you're thinking with Portals.
Very enjoyable game. The writing and humor are excellent, and the gameplay is precise.
Best potato adventure out there.
一款很有意思的游戏，美中不足的字幕，
这款游戏非常的吸引人，非常有创新性，它的前作传送门1是具有里程碑意义的作品，是非常经典的解谜类游戏，当然传送门2更加精彩，因为有全新游戏引擎的加持，我提名这款游戏“厉害了，我的哥”奖项

Excellentissime !
this game is good and I'm totally not just writing this for the badge thanks.

Ce jeu est juste magnifique, l'apothéose suite au premier opus. Les énigmes aussi bien en solo qu'en coop sont toujours ingénieuses et déstabilisantes pour certaines. La narration et le doublage des personnages sont excellents et le finale autant celui du solo que du multi a un imposant impacté émotionnel.

这是我最期待续作的一款游戏，还记得一周目时做梦的时候都在实验室里解密。

Easily worth the Test of Time Award. I thought about this game the second I saw the category. This game is just perfect.

好好玩啊，这个创意真的很棒，本来我是玩盗版的，后来通关后根本不能满足，虽然是学生党，还是咬牙入了正，合作通关真的很快乐，我觉得很值。
画质还是一如既往的半条命风格，虽然算不上华丽，但是很有味道，细节方面做得很精致，剧情也不错，最逗的是那个女声没完没了得冷笑话嘲讽
If i need to tell you about this game, you've been living in aperture science labs too long. PLAY IT
茫茫多的单人多人实验室，我却没有茫茫多的时间。
Un must have pour tout le monde :)

The Cake is a lie!

Such a great game. Recently I've been playing the singleplayer campaign, which is incredible btw, and it is so much better, story-wise, than the original Portal title. Not to mention you can make your own test chambers and easily post them to the community so others, including your friends can try them. Plus, you can play portal with your friends! Yeah, pretty much, totally recomended, and personally I'd get the Portal bundle to get both games if you wanna play the first as well.
